GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: adds a topic to the database

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: adds an article to the database and responds with the added article

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with requested article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with requested article id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
